channel.title: Showing inventory when opening interface [PI]

item.title: Showing inventory when opening interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I was just wondering what code I would use if I want a specific tab to open up when you open an interface. For example, when you open the bank interface with the code:

It shows your inventory. Is it one of these lines?

c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream();

Will rep++.

Read full topic
